title: pawanjain
author: pawanjain
created_time: January 31, 2023, 03:46:16 PMLast edit: May 15, 2023, 05:06:31 PM by pawanjain
content: Just came across a recent post on Instagram where it mentioned that we can see a little relief on crypto taxations in the upcoming Union Budget.While earlier, there was a 30% tax imposed on gains from crypto as well as TDS on every transaction, now there are talks that we can see a little relief on these.All these are just rumors till now and only the official announcement from the government can be considered final.Source: https://www.instagram.com/p/CoBjcNiMNt-/?igshid=MDJmNzVkMjY%3D
